22namespace {

24std::string GetNormalPageSpaceName(size_t index) {
25 // Check that space is not a large object space.
26 DCHECK_NE(RawHeap::kNumberOfRegularSpaces - 1, index);
27 // Handle regular normal page spaces.
28 if (index < RawHeap::kNumberOfRegularSpaces) {
29 return "NormalPageSpace" + std::to_string(index);
30 }
31 // Space is a custom space.
32 return "CustomSpace" +
33 std::to_string(index - RawHeap::kNumberOfRegularSpaces);
34}
35
36HeapStatistics::SpaceStatistics* InitializeSpace(HeapStatistics* stats,
37 std::string name) {
38 stats->space_stats.emplace_back();
39 HeapStatistics::SpaceStatistics* space_stats = &stats->space_stats.back();
40 space_stats->name = std::move(name);
41 return space_stats;
42}
43
44HeapStatistics::PageStatistics* InitializePage(
45 HeapStatistics::SpaceStatistics* stats) {
46 stats->page_stats.emplace_back();
47 HeapStatistics::PageStatistics* page_stats = &stats->page_stats.back();
48 return page_stats;
49}
50
51void FinalizePage(HeapStatistics::SpaceStatistics* space_stats,
52 HeapStatistics::PageStatistics** page_stats) {
53 if (*page_stats) {
54 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(space_stats);
55 space_stats->committed_size_bytes += (*page_stats)->committed_size_bytes;
56 space_stats->resident_size_bytes += (*page_stats)->resident_size_bytes;
57 space_stats->used_size_bytes += (*page_stats)->used_size_bytes;
58 }
59 *page_stats = nullptr;
60}
61
62void FinalizeSpace(HeapStatistics* stats,
63 HeapStatistics::SpaceStatistics** space_stats,
64 HeapStatistics::PageStatistics** page_stats) {
65 FinalizePage(*space_stats, page_stats);
66 if (*space_stats) {
67 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(stats);
68 stats->committed_size_bytes += (*space_stats)->committed_size_bytes;
69 stats->resident_size_bytes += (*space_stats)->resident_size_bytes;
70 stats->used_size_bytes += (*space_stats)->used_size_bytes;
71 }
72 *space_stats = nullptr;
73}
74
75void RecordObjectType(
76 std::unordered_map<const void*, size_t>& type_map,
77 std::vector<HeapStatistics::ObjectStatsEntry>& object_statistics,
78 HeapObjectHeader* header, size_t object_size) {
79 if (NameProvider::SupportsCppClassNamesAsObjectNames()) {
80 // Tries to insert a new entry into the typemap with a running counter. If
81 // the entry is already present, just returns the old one.
82 const auto it = type_map.insert({header->GetName().value, type_map.size()});
83 const size_t type_index = it.first->second;
84 if (object_statistics.size() <= type_index) {
85 object_statistics.resize(type_index + 1);
86 }
87 object_statistics[type_index].allocated_bytes += object_size;
88 object_statistics[type_index].object_count++;
89 }
90}
91
92} // namespace
93
94HeapStatistics HeapStatisticsCollector::CollectDetailedStatistics(
95 HeapBase* heap) {
96 HeapStatistics stats;
97 stats.detail_level = HeapStatistics::DetailLevel::kDetailed;
98 current_stats_ = &stats;
99
100 ClassNameAsHeapObjectNameScope class_names_scope(*heap);
101
102 Traverse(heap->raw_heap());
103 FinalizeSpace(current_stats_, &current_space_stats_, &current_page_stats_);
104
105 if (NameProvider::SupportsCppClassNamesAsObjectNames()) {
106 stats.type_names.resize(type_name_to_index_map_.size());
107 for (auto& it : type_name_to_index_map_) {
108 stats.type_names[it.second] = reinterpret_cast<const char*>(it.first);
109 }
110 }
111
112 // Resident set size may be smaller than the than the recorded size in
113 // `StatsCollector` due to discarded memory that is tracked on page level.
114 DCHECK_GE(heap->stats_collector()->allocated_memory_size(),
115 stats.resident_size_bytes);
116 return stats;
117}
118
119bool HeapStatisticsCollector::VisitNormalPageSpace(NormalPageSpace& space) {
120 DCHECK_EQ(0u, space.linear_allocation_buffer().size());
121
122 FinalizeSpace(current_stats_, &current_space_stats_, &current_page_stats_);
123
124 current_space_stats_ =
125 InitializeSpace(current_stats_, GetNormalPageSpaceName(space.index()));
126
127 space.free_list().CollectStatistics(current_space_stats_->free_list_stats);
128
129 return false;
130}
131
132bool HeapStatisticsCollector::VisitLargePageSpace(LargePageSpace& space) {
133 FinalizeSpace(current_stats_, &current_space_stats_, &current_page_stats_);
134
135 current_space_stats_ = InitializeSpace(current_stats_, "LargePageSpace");
136
137 return false;
138}
139
140bool HeapStatisticsCollector::VisitNormalPage(NormalPage& page) {
141 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(current_space_stats_);
142 FinalizePage(current_space_stats_, &current_page_stats_);
143
144 current_page_stats_ = InitializePage(current_space_stats_);
145 current_page_stats_->committed_size_bytes = kPageSize;
146 current_page_stats_->resident_size_bytes =
147 kPageSize - page.discarded_memory();
148 return false;
149}
150
151bool HeapStatisticsCollector::VisitLargePage(LargePage& page) {
152 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(current_space_stats_);
153 FinalizePage(current_space_stats_, &current_page_stats_);
154
155 const size_t object_size = page.PayloadSize();
156 const size_t allocated_size = LargePage::AllocationSize(object_size);
157 current_page_stats_ = InitializePage(current_space_stats_);
158 current_page_stats_->committed_size_bytes = allocated_size;
159 current_page_stats_->resident_size_bytes = allocated_size;
160 return false;
161}
162
163bool HeapStatisticsCollector::VisitHeapObjectHeader(HeapObjectHeader& header) {
164 if (header.IsFree()) return true;
165
166 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(current_space_stats_);
167 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(current_page_stats_);
168 // For the purpose of heap statistics, the header counts towards the allocated
169 // object size.
170 const size_t allocated_object_size =
171 header.IsLargeObject()
172 ? LargePage::From(
173 BasePage::FromPayload(const_cast<HeapObjectHeader*>(&header)))
174 ->PayloadSize()
175 : header.AllocatedSize();
176 RecordObjectType(type_name_to_index_map_,
177 current_page_stats_->object_statistics, &header,
178 allocated_object_size);
179 current_page_stats_->used_size_bytes += allocated_object_size;
180 return true;
181}
182
